channel.title: Comments on: My Nest Thermostat installation experience

item.title: By: Eric Dollaway
item.dc:creator: Eric Dollaway
item.description: Wow! That is one sweet lookin device! I looked at these pictures then I looked at the <a href="http://thermostatonline.com/reviews/lux-tx9000ts-touchscreen-7-day-programmable-thermostat" rel="nofollow">Lux TX9000TS</a> that's mounted on my wall. Then I cried a little... lol
item.content:encoded: Wow! That is one sweet lookin device! I looked at these pictures then I looked at the Lux TX9000TS that’s mounted on my wall. Then I cried a little… lol

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/index.php/archives/1329/comment-page-1#comment-4033">trish Holder</a>.
@Trish -- I'm more than a bit surprised that you think that I might have an affiliation with Nest Labs as I think it's quite clear that I'm generally displeased with the product. I have a Nest link at the top as this has been an EXTREMELY popular topic on my blog -- so much so that I thought I'd make it easier for others to find. I <strong>definitely</strong> have no affiliation with the company. :) If you want to converse more, feel free to send me an email (just send it to aaron at this web site and I'll get it).
item.content:encoded:
In reply to trish Holder.

@Trish — I’m more than a bit surprised that you think that I might have an affiliation with Nest Labs as I think it’s quite clear that I’m generally displeased with the product. I have a Nest link at the top as this has been an EXTREMELY popular topic on my blog — so much so that I thought I’d make it easier for others to find. I definitely have no affiliation with the company. :) If you want to converse more, feel free to send me an email (just send it to aaron at this web site and I’ll get it).

item.title: By: trish Holder
item.dc:creator: trish Holder
item.description:
Aaron,
I'd be interested in republishing your experience with the next on my publication, but I need to know that you have no affiliation with the company. All my content for Greenspiration Home (www.greenspirationhome.com) is by homeowners. I notice you have a Nest menu on your blog, so I was confused as to what affiliation you may have. However, I love your review and I think it would be great for my audience.
Trish
item.content:encoded:
Aaron,

I’d be interested in republishing your experience with the next on my publication, but I need to know that you have no affiliation with the company. All my content for Greenspiration Home (www.greenspirationhome.com) is by homeowners. I notice you have a Nest menu on your blog, so I was confused as to what affiliation you may have. However, I love your review and I think it would be great for my audience.

Trish
